projects.description: A web application that displays predictive maps generated with the folium library. The app allows users to login and save specific charts. This application was a team project, my role was to guide group collaboration and assist with Data Science linear regression models.

A web application built on top of the YouTube API. This app is a pet project that allowed users to utilize YouTube's database of videos with specific filters focused on videos that fell into the "learning" category. My role as a data engineer was to assist in building out our pipeline. After deciding to use Node.js and React for data handling, my role became assisting the machine learning side by creating dummy searches to model possible user behavior in hopes of creating an improved recommendation algorithm.

This is the capstone project I produced to obtain my Master of Science degree in Business Analytics with a focus in Finance. In this project I utilize jupyter notebooks and Python among several libraries to analyze a portfolio of five randomly selected tech stocks from the S&P 500. I utilized the Cvxopt library to generate 5000 random portfolios of which I use to calculate an efficient frontier or mix of assets.
